mapper.sql: select t.id ,t.name ,t.description ,t.access,t.assignee as assigneeStr ,DATE_FORMAT(t.START_TIME,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as startTimeStr, DATE_FORMAT(t.END_TIME,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as endTimeStr,t.members as membersStr,t.cc as ccStr,t.tags,t.CREATE_TIME as createTime,t.CREATE_USER as createUser, t.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime,t.UPDATE_USER as updateUser,t.status from oa_task t
